title: Love in the Buff
writer: Jody Luk, Yee-sum Luk (screenplay), Ho-Cheung Pang (based on characters created by), Ho-Cheung Pang (screenplay)
actors: Miriam Chin Wah Yeung, Shawn Yue, Mi Yang, Zheng Xu
plot: Former lovers Jimmy and Cherie discover that getting over each other isn't as easy as they thought in this sequel to the romantic comedy Love in a Puff.
